headline: Analyst Explains Why Walmart (WMT) Can Absorb Tariff Shock Better Than Others
summary: We recently published a list of Top 10 Stocks to Watch Ahead of May. In this article, we are going to take a look at where Walmart Inc. (NYSE:WMT) stands against other top stocks to watch ahead of May. Aswath Damodaran from NYU Stern School of Business said in a latest interview with CNBC that […]

headline: Contrarian Opinion: Tariffs, Inflation, and Recession Fears Could Be a Tailwind for This Retail Stock and Propel It to a $1 Trillion Valuation
summary: President Trump's new tariffs could cause prices to rise for consumers and induce a period of slowing economic growth.
